subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera, 43, is the oldest player in baseball, and Andy Pettitte, who turns 41 in June, is close behind. Yet both still perform close to the way they did at their peak.
snippet: Mariano Rivera, 43, is the oldest player in baseball, and Andy Pettitte, who turns 41 in June, is close behind. Yet both still perform close to the way they did at their peak.
